pr_title: Updating deployment README with local deployment workflow updates

timeline.bodyText: link isn't linking, can you fix that please? You can check the "rich" diff to make sure it works.
timeline.author: MikeDombo
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -7,10 +7,13 @@ Represents the json document which contains the desired state for the device
 
 # Startup

-evergreen service and initializes [***IotJobsHelper***](/src/main/java/com/aws/iot/evergreen/deployment/IotJobsHelper) and initiates the connection to AWS Iot via the 
-*IotJobsHelper*
+evergreen service and initializes [***IotJobsHelper***]
+(/src/main/java/com/aws/iot/evergreen/deployment/IotJobsHelper). *IotJobsHelper* initiates the connection to AWS Iot
